snippet: A doctor who earned a Bronze Star in Afghanistan got a special exception to wear a beard and turban, and he is working to make it easier for other Sikhs to enlist.
abstract: United States Army Maj Kamaljeet Singh Kalsi, American Sikh who earned a Bronze Star in Afghanistan, got a special exception to wear a beard and turban, and he is working to make it easier for other Sikhs to enlist.
